Browse the source code of qv2ray/3rdparty/QNodeEditor/include/nodes/internal/NodeGeometry.hpp

1#pragma once
2#include "Export.hpp"
3#include "PortType.hpp"
4#include "memory.hpp"
5
6#include <QtCore/QPointF>
7#include <QtCore/QRectF>
8#include <QtGui/QFontMetrics>
9#include <QtGui/QTransform>
10namespace QtNodes
11{
12 class NodeState;
13 class NodeDataModel;
14 class Node;
15 class NODE_EDITOR_PUBLIC NodeGeometry
16 {
17 public:
18 NodeGeometry(std::unique_ptr<NodeDataModel> const &dataModel);
19
20 public:
21 unsigned int height() const
22 {
23 return _height;
24 }
25 void setHeight(unsigned int h)
26 {
27 _height = h;
28 }
29 unsigned int width() const
30 {
31 return _width;
32 }
33 void setWidth(unsigned int w)
34 {
35 _width = w;
36 }
37 void setEntryHeight(unsigned int h)
38 {
39 _entryHeight = h;
40 }
41 unsigned int entryWidth() const
42 {
43 return _entryWidth;
44 }
45 void setEntryWidth(unsigned int w)
46 {
47 _entryWidth = w;
48 }
49 unsigned int entryHeight() const
50 {
51 return _entryHeight;
52 }
53 unsigned int spacing() const
54 {
55 return _spacing;
56 }
57 void setSpacing(unsigned int s)
58 {
59 _spacing = s;
60 }
61 bool hovered() const
62 {
63 return _hovered;
64 }
65 void setHovered(unsigned int h)
66 {
67 _hovered = h;
68 }
69 unsigned int nSources() const;
70 unsigned int nSinks() const;
71 QPointF const &draggingPos() const
72 {
73 return _draggingPos;
74 }
75 void setDraggingPosition(QPointF const &pos)
76 {
77 _draggingPos = pos;
78 }
79
80 public:
81 QRectF entryBoundingRect() const;
82 QRectF boundingRect() const;
83 /// Updates size unconditionally
84 void recalculateSize() const;
85 /// Updates size if the QFontMetrics is changed
86 void recalculateSize(QFont const &font) const;
87 QSize minimumEmbeddedSize() const;
88 QSize maximumEmbeddedSize() const;
89 // TODO removed default QTransform()
90 QPointF portScenePosition(PortIndex index, PortType portType, QTransform const &t = QTransform()) const;
91 PortIndex checkHitScenePoint(PortType portType, QPointF point, QTransform const &t = QTransform()) const;
92 QRect resizeRect() const;
93 /// Returns the position of a widget on the Node surface
94 QPointF widgetPosition() const;
95 /// Returns the maximum height a widget can be without causing the node to
96 /// grow.
97 int equivalentWidgetHeight() const;
98 unsigned int validationHeight() const;
99 unsigned int validationWidth() const;
100 static QPointF calculateNodePositionBetweenNodePorts(PortIndex targetPortIndex, PortType targetPort, Node *targetNode,
101 PortIndex sourcePortIndex, PortType sourcePort, Node *sourceNode, Node &newNode);
102
103 private:
104 unsigned int captionHeight() const;
105 unsigned int captionWidth() const;
106 unsigned int portWidth(PortType portType) const;
107
108 private:
109 // some variables are mutable because
110 // we need to change drawing metrics
111 // corresponding to fontMetrics
112 // but this doesn't change constness of Node
113 mutable unsigned int _width;
114 mutable unsigned int _height;
115 unsigned int _entryWidth;
116 mutable unsigned int _inputPortWidth;
117 mutable unsigned int _outputPortWidth;
118 mutable unsigned int _entryHeight;
119 unsigned int _spacing;
120 bool _hovered;
121 unsigned int _nSources;
122 unsigned int _nSinks;
123 QPointF _draggingPos;
124 std::unique_ptr<NodeDataModel> const &_dataModel;
125 mutable QFontMetrics _fontMetrics;
126 mutable QFontMetrics _boldFontMetrics;
127 };
128} // namespace QtNodes
